wikipedia_page.main: Andrew (Andy) William Smith (born 30 May 1969 in Sutton, Surrey) is a former English cricketer who played first-class and List A cricket for Surrey from 1993 to 1996.Playing against Oxford University in 1994 he scored 202 not out and 31 not out, and took three wickets. It was his only first-class century. In his next match a few days later he took his best figures, 5 for 103, against Somerset.His father, Bill Smith, played first-class cricket for Surrey as a batsman from 1961 to 1970.
